xtft_sinit.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This file defines the implementation of Tft device static initialization functionality.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver    Who   Date      Changes
 -----  ----  --------  -----------------------------------------------
 1.00a  sg    03/24/08  First release

#include "xparameters.h"
#include "xtft.h"

Functions

XTft_Config * XTft_LookupConfig (u16 DeviceId)

Variables

XTft_Config XTft_ConfigTable []

Function Documentation

XTft_Config* XTft_LookupConfig (  u16  DeviceId  ) 
 

This function obtains the Configuration pointer of the device whose ID is being passed as the parameter to the function.

Parameters:
DeviceId is the unique number of the device.
Returns:
Configuration pointer of the Device whose ID is given.
Note:
None.

Variable Documentation

XTft_Config XTft_ConfigTable[]
 

The configuration table for TFT devices in the table. Each device should have an entry in this table.
